name: user-auth-system
description: User Authentication System - Full Stack Application

scripts.install:all: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.dev: npm run dev:backend & npm run dev:frontend
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.start: npm run start:backend & npm run start:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:coverage:backend && npm run test:coverage:frontend
